metadata.title: CVE-2018-8036 on Ubuntu 21.04 (hirsute) - low.
metadata.description: In Apache PDFBox 1.8.0 to 1.8.14 and 2.0.0RC1 to 2.0.10, a carefully crafted (or fuzzed) file can trigger an infinite loop which leads to an out of memory exception in Apache PDFBox's AFMParser.

criterions.comment: libpdfbox-java package in hirsute, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '1:1.8.15-1').
libpdfbox2-java package in hirsute, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '2.0.11-1').
